Therapy.Name: Psychotherapy
Therapy.Description: is an interpersonal relational intervention used by psychotherapists to help individuals, couples, families or groups in problems of living
Therapy.Purpose: to eradicate the repressed feelings and confusions generated by early traumata

Therapy.Name: Group psychotherapy
Therapy.Description: is a form of psychotherapy which one or more therapists treat a small group of clients together as a group

Therapy.Name: Cognitive behavioral therapy
Therapy.Description: is a psychotherapeutic approach comprised of both cognitive and behavioral techniques
Therapy.Purpose: to change learned behavior by changing thinking patterns, beliefs and perceptions

Therapy.Name: Body-oriented psychotherapy
Therapy.Description: generally focuses on the link between the mind and the body and tries to access deeper levels of the psyche through greater awareness of the physical body and the emotions
Therapy.Purpose: to restore the inherent capacity to self-regulate

Therapy.Name: Pharmacotherapy
Therapy.Description: is the treatment of mental illness or mental disorders wth medication
